org.dockbox.selene.core.impl.util.files

Class DefaultConfigurateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dockbox.selene.core.util.files.ConfigurateManager
      • org.dockbox.selene.core.impl.util.files.DefaultConfigurateManager

  • public abstract class DefaultConfigurateManager
extends org.dockbox.selene.core.util.files.ConfigurateManager
    Implementation of ConfigurateManager containing dynamic mapping to appropriate ConfigurationLoaders based on the given FileType by the implementation of this type. Supporting FileType.YAML, FileType.JSON, FileType.XML, FileType.MOD_CONFIG, and FileType.CONFIG file types. Supports type mapping through NeutrinoObjectMapper, which allows for additional functionality on top of the normal Configurate functionality. See Neutrino for reference. Automatically generates, and checks the presence of, files in their directories. For both custom file locations and Extension.id() based.

      • DefaultConfigurateManager

        protected DefaultConfigurateManager(org.dockbox.selene.core.util.files.FileType fileType)
        Provides the given FileType to the super type ConfigurateManager. And registers any custom TypeSerializer types to TypeSerializers.getDefaultSerializers().
        Parameters:
        fileType - The file type to be used when mapping.
